nodes.name: NectarController

nodes.documentation:
@dev The fallback function is called when ether is sent to the contract, it
 simply calls `doTakerPayment()` . No tokens are created when takers contribute.
 `_owner`. Payable is a required solidity modifier for functions to receive
 ether, without this modifier functions will throw if ether is sent to them

nodes.name: proxyPayment
proxyAccountingCreation
onTransfer
onApprove
onBurn
doMakerPayment

nodes.documentation:
@dev `doTakerPayment()` is an internal function that sends the ether that this
  contract receives to the `vault`, creating no tokens
nodes.name: doTakerPayment

nodes.documentation:
@dev `doProxyAccounting()` is an internal function that creates tokens
 for fees pledged by the owner
nodes.name: doProxyAccounting

nodes.documentation:
@notice `onlyOwner` changes the location that ether is sent
 @param _newVaultAddress The address that will store the fees collected
nodes.name: setVault

nodes.documentation:
@notice `onlyOwner` can upgrade the controller contract
 @param _newControllerAddress The address that will have the token control logic
nodes.name: upgradeController
getFeeToTokenConversion

nodes.documentation: @dev topUpBalance - This is only used to increase this.balance in the case this controller is used to allow burning
nodes.name: topUpBalance

nodes.documentation: @dev evacuateToVault - This is only used to evacuate remaining to ether from this contract to the vault address
nodes.name: evacuateToVault

nodes.documentation: @dev enableBurning - Allows the owner to activate burning on the underlying token contract
nodes.name: enableBurning
claimTokens
